name: ROBLOX JS Server
description: A JS Server for ROBLOX created by Sentanos. Heroku add created by Skeletonarcher12

BOT_USERNAME.description: The username of the bot that is being used

BOT_PASSWORD.description: The password of the bot that is being used

BOT_KEY.description: The key to make sure no one access' your application without authorisation. (Best to use a random generator)

MAX_RANK.description: The maximum rank the bot can rank to
